title: ICYMI - Jason Reynolds & Ibram X. Kendi on "Stamped" and the Story of Racism in the U.S.
itunes:title: ICYMI - Jason Reynolds & Ibram X. Kendi on "Stamped" and the Story of Racism in the U.S.
description:
Authors Jason Reynolds and Ibram X. Kendi explain why they wanted to bring the history of American racism and anti-racism forward in their book "Stamped."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
